hero.title: Think faster. Work smarter.
hero.subtitle: Teamie keeps every project and meeting on track — with instant summaries of key points, decisions, and next steps. For professionals juggling multiple projects at once, meetings shouldn't drain your time and focus.
hero.cta: Let AI write the notes — you do the thinking.
hero.button: Try Teamie in your next meeting

solution.title: Teamie keeps all your meetings connected and actionable.

capsules.title: Meeting Capsules
capsules.description: Every meeting can be stored as a capsule, and new ones build on the last — no more isolated discussions. AI organizes past conversations into clear context so you always know the full story.

import.title: Import Meetings
import.description: Turn any external meeting notes into a Capsule to provide context for your new meetings.

summaries.title: Instant Summaries
summaries.description: Get the core insights in 30 seconds — know exactly what decisions were made and what you need to do next.

quickJoin.recentMeetingsDesc: See the meetings you recently joined
quickJoin.createFirstMeeting: Start by creating your first meeting!
quickJoin.quickStartDesc: Create a new meeting immediately and invite team members to join

meetingCreationForm.contextDesc: Select past meeting capsules to provide context for this meeting

personalCenter.historyDesc: View all meetings you have participated in
personalCenter.createFirst: Start by creating your first meeting!
personalCenter.capsulesDesc: AI-generated summaries from your past meetings
personalCenter.generateFirst: Generate capsules from your past meetings!

meetingInvitation.title: Invitation Link
meetingInvitation.tip: Share this link to invite others to join the meeting

preMeetingSection.objectivePlaceholder: Discuss Q1 product features and prioritization
preMeetingSection.questionPlaceholder: Share your thoughts or questions before the meeting...

PostMeetingNote.summaryPlaceholder:
Please summarize the meeting following these guidelines:
• Summarize key decisions and conclusions
• Clarify action items and responsible persons
• Set deadlines
• Confirm next meeting arrangements

importCapsule.title: Import Meeting Transcript
importCapsule.description: Import external meeting transcripts to create AI-powered capsules
importCapsule.guestMode: Guest mode: You can use {{remaining}}/{{max}} more imports
importCapsule.guestLimitReached: Guest mode has reached maximum imports ({{max}} times), please login to continue
